title: Lookin for Ranked team players to grind rewards
body:
So it's as the title says, im looking for people to grind ranked team queue with.

I don't particularly care about how high the team gets ranked in itself, or if it should keep going after the goal is achieved, such things can be decided later. However i am quite a busy person (and im sure many of you also have commitments to meet) so i want to get all 3 ward skins within the next 3 - 4 days if possible.

1. Can play all the time while ranked queues are up, including all the way through to 3 - 4am [AEST](http://www.timeanddate.com/time/zones/aest).
2. Voice chat capable (curse, teamspeak), even if you have no mic and can only listen that's fine.
3. Preferably not bronze in solo rank.

Feel free to friend me in game.
